data.name: AsyncOperationFailed
data.value: An asynchronous Windows Azure management operation {0} failed.

data.name: CreateMobileServiceApplicationTemplate
data.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <Application xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/windowsazure"> <Name>{0}</Name> <Label>{1}</Label> <Description>{2}</Description> <Configuration>{3}</Configuration> </Application>

data.name: ErrorGettingDefaultServiceLocation
data.value: Unable to determine the default location for new Windows Azure Mobile Services.

data.name: ExisingSqlDbRequiresExistingSqlServer
data.value: To use existing SQL databse you must specify both SQL database name and SQL server name parameters as well as SQL server username and password.

data.name: InvalidManagementEndpoint
data.value: The mobile service management endpoint {0} is not recognized.

data.name: InvalidSqlUsername
data.value: The login name must meet the following requirements: 1. It must be a SQL Identifier. 2. It cannot be a system name, for example: admin, administrator, sa, root, dbmanager, loginmanager, etc. 3. It cannot be a built-in database user or role like dbo, guest, public, etc. 4. It cannot contain: spaces, tabs, or returns, unicode characters, nonalphabetic characters ("<>|:*?\/#&;,%=). 5. It cannot begin with digits (0 through 9), @, $, +.

data.name: ManagemendEndpointDeprecated
data.value: Cannot complete operation. Windows Azure management endpoint {0} was deprecated.

data.name: ManagementCertificateWithoutPrivateKey
data.value: ManagementCertificate must contain private key.

data.name: ManagementServiceReturnedHttpError
data.value: A call to the Windows Azure Mobile Services management endpoint returned unexpected HTTP status code {0}.

data.name: MissingManagementCertificate
data.value: ManagementCertificate must be specified on the MobileServiceManagementClient.

data.name: MissingMobileServiceManagementEndpoint
data.value: MobileServiceManagementEndpoint must be specified on the MobileServiceManagementClient.

data.name: MissingServiceName
data.value: The required service name parameter is not provided.

data.name: MissingSqlAdminPassword
data.value: The required SQL administrator password parameter is not provided.

data.name: MissingSqlAdminUsername
data.value: The required SQL administrator username parameter is not provided.

data.name: MissingSubscriptionId
data.value: SubscriptionId must be specified on the MobileServiceManagementClient.

data.name: NoOperationIdInResponse
data.value: A call to Windows Azure Mobile Services management endpoint did not return asynchronous operation ID.

data.name: NoResponse
data.value: A call to Windows Azure Mobile Services management endpoint did not return a response.

data.name: ServiceUnhealthy
data.value: Creation of a mobile service failed, but some of the artifacts had been provisioned. Please refer to the Windows Azure Mobile Services management portal to inspect the status of the mobile service and remove unwanted artifacts. Overall status: {0}. SQL server provisioning status: {1}. SQL database provisioning status: {2}. Mobile service provisioning status: {3}.

data.name: UnableToAccessConfiguration
data.value: Unable to obtain configuration information for Windows Azure Mobile Services management endpoints from {0}.

data.name: UnableToProcessResponse
data.value: A call to Windows Azure Mobile Services management endoint returned a response that cannot be parsed as XML: {0}

data.name: UnexpectedAsyncOperationStatus
data.value: An asynchronous Windows Azure management operation returned an unrecognized status of {0}.

data.name: UnexpectedResponse
data.value: A call to Windows Azure Mobile Services management endoint returned an invalid response: {0}

data.name: UnexpectedTypeOfResponse
data.value: A call to the Windows Azure Mobile Services management endpoing returned unexpected response type. Expected type is {0} and actual is {1}.

data.name: WeakSqlAdminPassword
data.value: The specified SQL administrator password does not meet strength requirements. The password must be at least 8 characters long, cannot contain the SQL administrator username, and must contain at least three of the following types of characters: uppercase letter, lowercase letter, digit, non-alphanumeric character.

data.name: WeakSqlPassword
data.value: The SQL administrator password does not meet strength requirements. SQL administrator password must be at least 8 characters long, not contain the SQL administrator username, and contain characters from at least 3 of the following classes of characters: uppercase letter A-Z, lowercase letter a-z, digit 0-9, and a non-alphanumeric character.
